description:
Take on multiday excursions in technical terrain with comfortable and protected feet. The Acrux TR is made with a lightweight and highly wear-resistant upper, thanks to it's integrated micro-plates - a material commonly used in bomb-disposal suits. Protective TPU overlay and rubber toecap in high-abrasion areas. An integrated TPU chassis stabilizes and supports your foot on uneven terrain.

  • SuperFabric® upper is infused with tiny guard plates for durability and abrasion resistance
  • Waterproof-breathable GORE-TEX® membrane shelter feet from the elements
  • Durable TPU film overlay and rubber toecap resist abrasion and protect feet from trail bumps
  • 3D moulded Ortholite™ footbed delivers maximum comfort, breathability and arch support
  • Injected EVA midsole cushions underfoot
  • Integrated TPU chassis adds stability and torsional rigidity on technical trails
  • Vibram® MegaGrip™ rubber outsole provides confident footing in varied terrain
name: Arc'teryx Acrux TR Gore-Tex Hiking Boots - Women's
